projects.name: Job Costing Dashboard
projects.description: Labour & materials tracking with SAGE 50 integration. Compares budgeted vs actual costs, tracks GP margins, and monitors budget consumption across all active jobs.

milestones.text: Labour Cost tracking & budget export CSV
Upload current project data ‚Äî 30% of jobs uploaded
Box integration ‚Äî automated SAGE CSV sync

projects.name: Estimator App
projects.description: Generator enclosure quoting tool ‚Äî reimplements PE's master Excel estimating logic into a web app. Quote totals now use detailed line-item calculations. Security hardened, deployment-ready. Major accuracy fix applied ‚Äî UI and backend now aligned on finishing/GI line items. RFP parsing improved. Still validating across all enclosure types and kW ratings.

milestones.text: Security hardening, input validation & structured logging
Deployment config ‚Äî Procfile, runtime.txt, requirements.txt, /health endpoint
Quote totals accuracy fix ‚Äî detailed line-item calculations replacing simplified formula
Project infrastructure ‚Äî reference estimates (BC Hydro 150kW, Treaty Creek 150kW), data configs, test suite, docs
UI readability ‚Äî label contrast, Advanced Overrides toggle fix, Project Options styling
Validate estimation engine against real quotes
Labour hour calibration across all enclosure types
Detailed project archive database ‚Äî historical quotes & completed jobs
AI integration ‚Äî match current RFQs against historical projects for quick estimating
Estimating knowledge base ‚Äî guided workflow for non-technical users

projects.name: Project Management App
projects.description: Internal project management tool for Pacific Enclosures. Scope and requirements to be defined.

projects.name: Purchasing App
projects.description: Purchasing and procurement tool for Pacific Enclosures. Scope and requirements to be defined.

timeline.title: Job Costing ‚Äî Labour Cost Tracking & Budget Export
timeline.desc: Added Labour Cost column across full stack (template, parser, DB, API, dashboard, charts). New /download/budget-export endpoint for exporting budgets as editable CSV.

timeline.title: Estimator ‚Äî Quote Totals Accuracy Fix
timeline.desc: Major fix: UI was showing $83K-$153K instead of $401K for Treaty Creek 150kW. Replaced simplified surface_area formula with detailed finishing/GI line-item totals. Added 30+ estimator params, 7 missing toggle checkboxes, and collapsible Advanced Overrides.

timeline.title: Estimator ‚Äî RFP Parsing & Infrastructure
timeline.desc: Fixed RFP sound parsing to convert meters to feet. Added project infrastructure: data configs, reference estimates (BC Hydro 150kW, Treaty Creek 150kW), test suite, docs, and RFP parser.

timeline.title: Estimator ‚Äî UI Readability Improvements
timeline.desc: Fixed label contrast, Advanced Overrides toggle, Project Options styling. Quote totals now consistent across exchange rate, escalation, and quote saving UI components.

timeline.title: Estimator Security Hardening
timeline.desc: Closed SQL injection vulnerabilities, sanitized 23 error responses, added security headers (X-Frame-Options, CSP), SECRET_KEY, and Flask error handlers. Database hardened with foreign keys, transaction rollback, and query limits.

timeline.title: Estimator Deployment Readiness
timeline.desc: Added Procfile, runtime.txt, requirements.txt, /health endpoint, /robots.txt, and environment-based config. Estimator instance cached as singleton. Ready for Heroku deployment.

timeline.title: Structured Logging & Input Validation
timeline.desc: Replaced all print/traceback calls with structured logging. Added request/response logging hooks. Input validation for kW (1-5000), enclosure type, construction material, and tank type.

timeline.title: Test Baseline ‚Äî 300kW Princeton RCMP
timeline.desc: Created 300kW Princeton RCMP expected_values.json baseline. Fixed 500kW DFEK Seattle zero totals in test suite.

timeline.title: Job Costing ‚Äî 30% of Jobs Uploaded
timeline.desc: Uploaded 30% of current project data to the Job Costing Dashboard.

timeline.title: Estimator Calibration Milestone
timeline.desc: 500kW DFEK Seattle benchmark fully calibrated ‚Äî design specs exact, finishing materials -0.00%, labour hours exact match across all categories. Genset install materials +3.35%.

timeline.title: Estimator Data Architecture Built
timeline.desc: 13 JSON lookup tables created (clearances, door rules, enclosure sizing, labor rates, materials, pricing, shipping, silencer sizing, sound levels). Full data-driven configuration.

timeline.title: Test Suite & Reference Benchmarks
timeline.desc: Automated accuracy test suite built. 3 reference estimate benchmarks structured: 150kW BC Hydro, 300kW Princeton RCMP, 500kW DFEK Seattle.

timeline.title: RFP Parser & Repo Restructure
timeline.desc: RFP parser with batch processing built. Full repo restructured with clean organization, CLAUDE.md documentation, and archived old analysis files.

timeline.title: PM Dashboard Created
timeline.desc: Standalone project management dashboard for tracking all PE development work.

timeline.title: Box Integration Planned
timeline.desc: Automated SAGE 50 CSV sync via Box API ‚Äî eliminate manual uploads by watching for new SAGE exports in Box.

timeline.title: Job Costing v1.0 Deployed
timeline.desc: Full dashboard with SAGE parsing, budget uploads, variance analysis, and portfolio overview live on Heroku.

timeline.title: Heroku Runtime Fix
timeline.desc: Fixed Python runtime version to 3.11.11 for stable deployment.

timeline.title: Estimator Demo Sandbox Built
timeline.desc: Initial demo sandbox created ‚Äî not yet functional. Estimation engine, genset DB, and UI scaffolded but requires extensive testing and validation.

timeline.title: Estimator Excel Logic Documented
timeline.desc: Analyzed 3,842 Excel formulas from master estimating spreadsheet and documented complete logic.
